message: Let's be practical, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your potential gains!
Alice, my turn. I believe in fairness, and it's only right I get a larger share considering the inflation working against me.  Think it over.
Bob, let's be realistic.  The longer this drags on, the less it benefits you.  I'm offering a reasonable split. Time is money, Bob!
Alice, this is my final offer.  You're getting a good deal considering the inflation.  Let's wrap this up.
